paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR Ser50Arg variant, including penetrance data and individual case details.

individual_records.phenotype_details: slight numbness in toes, cardiac amyloidosis
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Ten years after transplantation, he felt a slight numbness in his toes, and cardiac amyloidosis was simultaneously suspected upon a heart function evaluation.

functional_data.summary: The Ser50Arg mutation is associated with the development of various symptoms of ATTRm.

variants.additional_notes: This is the first report of a case with a Ser50Arg mutation.
key_quotes: We herein report this first case of amyloid polyneuropathy and myocardial amyloidosis after DLT from hereditary ATTR amyloidosis with a transthyretin Ser50Arg mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR Ser50Arg variant was extracted successfully.
